devdoc.author: Babylon Finance Abstract class that houses aave borring/lending logic.

params._maxCollateralFactor: Max collateral factor allowed (from 0 to a 100)

params._assetToken: Asset to get the collateral factor

devdoc.title: AaveBorrowIntegration

getBorrowBalance(address,address).notice: Get the amount of borrowed debt that needs to be repaid

getCollateralBalance(address,address).notice: Get the amount of collateral supplied hparam asset   The collateral asset

getCollateralFactor(address).notice: Returns the collateral factor of an asset

getRemainingLiquidity(address).notice: Get the remaining liquidity available to borrow
